Key Match Events: Sean Manaea pitched two-hit ball over seven innings
Francisco Lindor belted his 29th home run
Marte doubled to center, Reyes scored
Miscellaneous Highlights: The White Sox set franchise record with 107th loss
Others: Umpires: Home Plate Umpire - Rob Drake, First Base Umpire - D.J. Reyburn, Second Base Umpire - John Libka, Third Base Umpire - James Hoye
